*div1 type="summary"* *p*Joshua Child to Austin et al., Port Gibson, Miss., May 12, 1825. Introducing Hugh Connell. Prospects of "large emigration of citizens of wealth and respectability." */p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Port. Gibson*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="05-12-1825">May 12—1825*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p*GENTLEMEN,*/p*
*p*My friend *person_mentioned*Mr. Hugh Connell*/person_mentioned* of the *location_mentioned*County of Wilkinson*/location_mentioned* in this state visits the *location_mentioned*Province of Texas*/location_mentioned*—for the purpose of exploring the *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned*, for his own satisfaction—in the first place, should he be pleased—with the soil and climate, as well as the other prospects and advantages it affords,—his wishes are to obtain *location_mentioned*lands */location_mentioned*with a view to a permanent settlement and establishment in the *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned*.*/p* *p* This *person_mentioned*Gentleman */person_mentioned*has held the office of*person_mentioned* high sheriff */person_mentioned*among us, for many years and discharged the duties of the office with credit and ability—A year or two since he voluntarily retired from office—and has since lived on his *location_mentioned*plantation*/location_mentioned*—*person_mentioned*Mr. Connell*/person_mentioned* is a man with a *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*and large *person_mentioned*connections */person_mentioned*his moral character is unexception- able—Attentions and civilities conferred on him will be thankfully acknowledged by*/p* *p**person_mentioned*Joshua Child*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*N. B. I intend to pay you a visit myself this *date_mentioned n="SUmmer - 1825">summer*/date_mentioned*—but official duties here require my presence at *location_mentioned*Home*/location_mentioned*—The reputation of the *person_mentioned*colonists */person_mentioned*in *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*—as well as of the *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*itself—stands very fair in the *location_mentioned*U. States*/location_mentioned*—And the prospects here are very nattering—in favor of a large emigration of *person_mentioned*citizens */person_mentioned*of wealth and respectability—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*J Child*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*[Addressed :]*person_mentioned*Capt Gaines*/person_mentioned*—*location_mentioned*Nacogdoches */location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Col Austin*/person_mentioned*—*location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Mr. Price*/person_mentioned*—*location_mentioned*La Bahia */location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Baron de Bastrop*/person_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Monsieur Le Baume*/person_mentioned*—*location_mentioned*St. Antonio*/location_mentioned**/p*
